item.title: Titanic data analysis - by Gabriele
item.description: Analysis of age Below graph shows the distribution of the passengers’ age Approximately half of the passengers were in their 20ties and 30ties The graph below shows the distribution of the age of female passengers who survived Female passengers who survived were mainly in their twenties and thirties, which likely is down to the fact that this age group formed the largest proportion of the passengers The graph below shows the age distrubution of female passengers who died
